data.title: Christopher Eccleston Still Has a Strong Ask For Returning to Doctor Who
data.meta_description: The actor, who has spent 18 years slowly opening up about his time on Doctor Who , is now, at the very least, incredibly clear about what he'd need to return.
data.text:

Big Finish, itâs up to you.â
